data.question: What method was used for the synthesis of Ag2[HBTC][im] (1)?
What is the role of polyethylene glycol in the synthesis of nanoparticles of 1?
data.answer: Polyethylene glycol was dissolved into a mixture to prevent agglomeration under sonication.

data.question: How was the antibacterial efficiency of 1-PLA determined?
data.answer: By investigating the minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) against E. coli, P. aeruginosa, S. aureus, and M. smegmatis.

data.question: What was the purpose of adding Dithiothreitol (DTT) during proteome sample preparation?
data.answer: DTT was added to reduce disulfide bonds.

data.question: What was the resolution of the Q Exactive mass spectrometer used in LCâˆ’MS/MS analysis?
What modifications were set as variable during data processing in MaxQuant environment?
data.answer: Oxidation (M) (+15.995 Da) and acetylation (protein N-termini) (+42.011 Da)

data.question: What was the outcome of the antibacterial activity test of 1-PLA against E. coli and S. aureus?
data.answer: 1-PLA showed an inhibition rate of more than 95.0% against both E. coli and S. aureus.

data.question: What was the main finding from the quantitative proteomics analysis regarding the antibacterial mechanism of 1-PLA?
data.answer: The antibacterial mechanism of 1-PLA was associated with the slow release of Ag+ ions, destroying of energy metabolism, dissipation of proton motive force, and decreasing or losing of transport system.

data.question: What was the healing rate of wounds treated with 1-PLA in the in vivo wound healing test?
What was the significance of the IR spectrum analysis for 1-PLA?
data.answer: The IR spectrum analysis confirmed the successful loading of MOFs into the nanofibers and the existence of PLA, indicating the successful synthesis of 1-PLA.
